post.author: 이성기

comment.author: 황성규
comment.content: 커뮤니티원이 오라클을 쓰고있습니다. BLOB은 안쓰지만 CLOB은 쓰지요. 소스 뒤져보고 올릴께요.

post.content:
Does any have working Java code that they can send me that inserts into BLOB table in Oracle?
NOTE: Inserting BLOBs into DB2 does work differently from my research on the Internet so that is why I am asking about Oracle specifically (Oracle likes to be different).
post.title: inserts into BLOB table in Oracle?
